guide: You will passively get progress
in this by just having a pet
equipped all time. Even a
Level 100 pet works for this.
To get easy progress in this do
contests like Wheat, Potato, Carrot
or Mushroom as those are easy
Bronze or Silver Medals to get.
For this you will need Combat 15 and
completion of the previous floor.
Going for this with your friends is
probably the best option or you
could use party finder.
Once you acquire a Void Sword and a decent
armor like Ender or Glacite this should be
fairly easy to do. You might get a little
progress in this from doing the Slayer Goal.
You will get passive progress for this
while going for other goals. If you want
to specifically go for this, use a
Cobblestone Generator on your island.
Do 3 Tier 1 Revenant Horror Bosses
and claim the rewards by talking to Maddox.
Use Enchanted Sugar that you get from
killing pests in The Garden or from
farming some Sugar Cane to brew
Speed Potions (you will also need
some nether warts for Awkward Potions first)
Mine 50 Iron in the Gold Mine
to unlock Iron Minions. Then buy
Iron from the Mine Merchant in The Hub
and Iron Forger in the Gold Mine and
craft as many minions as you can.
Give them the best fuel and storage you
have access to and don't forget Auto Smelters.
Remember to collect in time.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold, Diamond, Mushroom
and Leaflet Armor. Grind Glacite Armor
for the goal I've got Chills!
and equip them all in one lobby.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
This requires Catacombs Level 1 and
a completion of the previous floor.
You may need help from party finder
or friends for this.
Save your coins from Meiser and ideally
you get a score of 270+ in your run for
High Score! You may need more coins than
250k if you do drop rarer loot.
Remember you can open chests at Croesus
in the Dungeon Hub up to 48h after the run.
Unlock Skeleton Minions by killing skeletons you
run into along your way. Then buy
Bones from the Adventurer in The Hub
and craft as many minions as you can.
Give them the best fuel and storage you
have access to.
Remember to collect in time.

note: Get Bronze or higher in a contest
guide: For this you will need Farming 10.
Your best options for this will probably be
Wheat/Potato/Carrot in the Garden or Mushroom
if you use an Efficiency 5 Silk Touch Gold Axe
in the Desert.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in the Hub.
Place as many minions as you can,
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on owocato's, xMeru's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5), preferably Ender Armor
while you're in The End or Mushroom Armor
during the night.
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
If you still struggle, reforge your
armor to Titanic.

note: Wear a full set of Glacite
guide: You will need Mining 12 for this as you
need to enter the Dwarven Mines for this.
Remember that Glacite Walkers take more
damage from pickaxes.
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from the Smithmonger
in the Hub and reforge a weapon with it.
§4Make sure to NOT shift-click it out
§4of the menu after applying!
You will get some progress for this
by working on other goals.
The easiest to go for are:
Mushroom, Oak Wood, Bone,
Sand, Wheat, Iron and Seeds.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub,
or enchant any weapon with Critical 5
(costs 50 Levels).
Get the common Rock from mining
2.5k Ores and hand it to Kat in The Hub
(takes a day and 100k coins) or mine
5k more Ores to get the uncommon Rock.
Remember to equip it!
You will most likely get this from
leveling up skills.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
§nNo eggs:§r
Bingo, Endermen, Grandma Wolf, Armadillo,
Squid, Guardian, Bee, Dolphin, Reindeer,
Rock, Tarantula, Owl and Zoo
§nEggs:§r
Jerry, Silverfish, Pig, Rabbit, Endermite and Bat
If you do eggs you will need 2.5k Chicken Collection
and you'll want a Chicken Minion that can create more
Enchanted Eggs for you once you put your first one in.
Hit 10 Endermen in The End
so they follow you, then kill them
all as quickly as you can.
You most likely want to use Ender Armor
and a Void Sword for this.
